languages.text: {n}Волк разводит руками.{/n} "Ничего, клянусь честью. Он исчез, его корабль пропал без вести. На наших руках его крови нет".
{n}Thorbald throws up his hands.{/n} "Nothing, I swear on my honour. He disappeared, and so did his ship. There is no blood of his upon our hands."
languages.original_text: {n}Волк разводит руками.{/n} "Ничего, клянусь честью. Он исчез, его корабль пропал без вести. На наших руках его крови нет".

traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}索巴德举起双手。{/n}“什么都没有，我以我的荣耀发誓。他就那样消失了，他的船也不见了，我们的双手没有沾过他的鲜血。”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald throws up his hands.{/n} "Nothing, I swear on my honour. He disappeared, and so did his ship. There is no blood of his upon our hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德举起双手。{/n}“什么都没有，我以我的荣耀发誓。他就那样消失了，他的船也不见了，我们的双手没有沾过他的鲜血。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald lève les bras au ciel.{/n} « Non, je vous en donne ma parole d'honneur. Il a disparu, tout comme son vaisseau. Nous n'avons pas son sang sur les mains. »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald throws up his hands.{/n} "Nothing, I swear on my honour. He disappeared, and so did his ship. There is no blood of his upon our hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald lève les bras au ciel.{/n} « Non, je vous en donne ma parole d'honneur. Il a disparu, tout comme son vaisseau. Nous n'avons pas son sang sur les mains. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}トールバルドは両手を上げた。{/n}「何も知らない。誓って言う。奴は姿を消して、奴の船も消滅した。俺たちは奴を手にかけていない」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald throws up his hands.{/n} "Nothing, I swear on my honour. He disappeared, and so did his ship. There is no blood of his upon our hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドは両手を上げた。{/n}「何も知らない。誓って言う。奴は姿を消して、奴の船も消滅した。俺たちは奴を手にかけていない」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald levanta las manos.{/n} «Nada, lo juro por mi honor. Desapareció, al igual que su barco. No hay sangre suya en nuestras manos».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald throws up his hands.{/n} "Nothing, I swear on my honour. He disappeared, and so did his ship. There is no blood of his upon our hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald levanta las manos.{/n} «Nada, lo juro por mi honor. Desapareció, al igual que su barco. No hay sangre suya en nuestras manos».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald schlägt die Hände über dem Kopf zusammen.{/n} "Nichts, ich schwöre es bei meiner Ehre. Er ist verschwunden, genau wie sein Schiff. Sein Blut klebt nicht an unseren Händen."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald throws up his hands.{/n} "Nothing, I swear on my honour. He disappeared, and so did his ship. There is no blood of his upon our hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald schlägt die Hände über dem Kopf zusammen.{/n} "Nichts, ich schwöre es bei meiner Ehre. Er ist verschwunden, genau wie sein Schiff. Sein Blut klebt nicht an unseren Händen."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: {n}Thorbald, ellerini havaya kaldırıyor.{/n} "Hiçbir şey. Onurum üzerine yemin ederim. Gemisi de kendisi de ortadan kayboldu. Elimize onun kanı bulaşmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald throws up his hands.{/n} "Nothing, I swear on my honour. He disappeared, and so did his ship. There is no blood of his upon our hands."
